QueryDefinition.Query:
select p.encid, cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when p.encid = '' or p.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(p.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, proc_date, p.provid_perform as provid, case when proc_code_type IN ('CPT4', 'HCPCS', 'ICD9', 'ICD10') then proc_code else NULL end as source_code, case when proc_code_type NOT IN ('CPT4', 'HCPCS', 'ICD9', 'ICD10') then proc_code else NULL end as source_code2, case when proc_code_type NOT IN ('CPT4', 'HCPCS', 'ICD9', 'ICD10') or proc_code_type is NULL then 1 else 0 end as unknown
from {sc}.procedure as p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE
where proc_code is not NULL order by cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
